Review Title: Eat healthy and stay fit!!Worth every penny!!
Reviews: Well,my husband and I have been wanting to buy it from quite sometime after we have practically seen how awesome food it cooks and that too with much much less oil than normal cooking.I am totally in love with my new kitchen machine.I have cooked litti(Bihari delicacy) and it's awesome and super easy and convenient to make them in this machine.I have cooked besan wali bhindi,grilled chiken and pakodas,will be trying out samosas very soon.Got for it guys,it's worth every penny.Save  yourself with all the fried food without compromising too much on the taste.

This product is really great...u just have to be realistic regarding your expectations from an air fryer...it makes tasty n delicious food but obviously healthy food is not going to taste as good as it‚Äôs fried version...but the difference in taste for frozen snacks is not much n I prefer air fried snacks n potato chips any day over fried ones.
The instruction manual was missing.The recipe book was missing.The serial number was already registered with Havells website - how is this possible if the product is new and not re-sold?

This rating is for Havells service. Sorry to say this but worst service from Havells. From 15 days I am calling customer care and still issue is not fixed, my call was disconnected by a customer care representative without answering the query. Air fryer is not powering on it's under warranty without addressing the issue case is closed. Worst service.

Review Title: No User Manual Or Recipe book along with delivery pkg
Reviews: Product was delivered in a carton box which had box containing Air Fryer.  Havells box was totally damaged. However, luckily, the air fryer was intact. Product is good.Main issue faced is that there was NO user manual or Recipe Book which shows as part of the package on Havells official website.We are first time user of the Air Fryer and were absolutely blank in how to use. We had to figure out thru trial and errors and exploring YouTube videos.Please send me the user manual & recipe book which is missing.  Otherwise the product is good.
Easy to use nd paisa vassol then other compare and economic,happy with that product

Review Title: Good product if it is genuine.
Reviews: Good product. Easy to use. Earlier I had ordered this from different seller but I had return it as it was not heating up. Only air was blowing. Then I placed new order on this seller & now I am satisfied with this piece. I found that bowl material thickness was more than earlier ordered product of same make. Even saperator plate was not fitting in bowl.May be it was duplicate product.

This air fryer fulfills what it promises. its basket is large and one can cook, bake and grill in this fryer. requires no or minimum oil for few dishes but if u r making something from bread then i suggest you to apply oil/ghee in order to make it brown in color. the taste of the dishes of course differs in this as compare to the deep frying but not much. you can put a mould of 6' in its basket for baking cakes.
Microwave can do whatever air frier can do. Besides mine started malfunctioning after 4 months. And service is pretty bad.

Review Title: Good product. Button text indicators wore off in 2 days.
Reviews: Bought this for my parents. While the product itself is easy to use, quick and does what is supposed to, the quality of the paint job on the front panel is questionable. As you can see in the photo, the text wore off within two days of use. Now we just have to rely on memory as to which button is for what, or keep referring to the manual. That's a real shame. I've been reading a lot of reviews from other people about counterfeit products. I hope this one isn't from that batch.

Massively overrated product. Good for making french fries and very few other things. Recipe book from Havell's only includes some 5-7 vegetarian recipes.For a normal indian household which cooks a variety of items, you'll be left wondering what temperatures to set to make a particular item since there's no guidance available anywhere.Youtube videos which claim to have made great are a complete and total farce.It is touted as the replacement to frying but it isn't anywhere close to that. Most food items will require at least an oil coating on them to be made properly. And the others, you simply can't make with an air fryer.Overall its a dud technology for India with limited usability but high marketing & propaganda by the makers.

Review Title: Fully digital Air fryer with very smooth buttons ‚îÇ Actual capacity only 2.5 L, NOT 4 L as advertised
Reviews: I bought this Havells Prolife Digi Air fryer from Amazon in July 2017 for Rs.9982/- after much contemplation whether to go for Philips 5220 or this.Unfortunately, the key requirement I chose this Havells air fryer instead of Philips is not fulfilled which I recognized only after getting the product: The requirement is that my wife wanted larger capacity. The Philips HD 9220 is 2.2 L of capacity which we found is small. We even went to a local retail to check the size. As Havells is advertising the capacity as 4 L, we went for this one which is almost the same cost.The main misleading point is that Havells says "Pan capacity of 4L", but we can't cook anything directly in the pan. The basket that goes into it in which we put the actual food ingredients is only 2.5 L. Hence, the actual effective capacity is only 2.5 L. Anyway, I couldn't see any other air fryer which offers capacity greater than this 2-3L range, hence retained the product._____PROs:¬Ø¬Ø¬Ø¬Ø¬Øüëç Full digital - no manual rotatable knobs. Display of temperature and time makes it easy to configure instead of knobs.üëç The touch of buttons is very smooth. Just graze the finger over it and it takes the input, no need to press.üëç Functioning is excellent - made french fries as per the recipe mentioned in the recipes book obtained along with the product and they turned out perfect.üëç Product looks sturdy - plastic quality is very good.üëç Havells is a very well known brand. So, can go for it as an alternative to Philips_____CONs:¬Ø¬Ø¬Ø¬Ø¬Øüëé The capacity of the basket is only 2.5 L. Havells is misleadingly advertising "pan capacity = 4 L" which can't be used for actual cooking. It's just for collecting excess oil during cooking.üëé The operation manual is almost useless. They just changed the name and gave the Havell's old model's (one with the knobs) manual. So, you need to figure out the buttons usage yourself through experimentation.üëé The name of the buttons is misleading. "Mode" is for temperature setting, "Timer+ and Timer-" are for timer settings. There is no concept of modes. I couldn't see any operation of "Call" button which even doesn't glow.

Unexpected and disappointed that this is a Havells product, which has become a good brand recently!The first piece started giving out a white smoke and burning platic smell as soon as it was On (no oil or food stuff was burning, its circuit was giving white smoke).The replacement arranged by Amazon  also turned out to be faulty and didnt on even when plugged in.Amazon service is excellent in handling the replacement and refund. Havells should do better job with this product to make it like Philips products in terms of quality.

Review Title: Brand name is suffering reliability problem now.
Reviews: We use the air fryer in a limited way.  It was put to use no more than 10 times since its purchase.  It quit.  There were problems with the power circuit.  I know for sure there were no chances for overloading it.  It cost me Rs. 1800 to get it fixed.  I have had other brand air-fryers for 5 years+ with no problems. I also have a 3 hp single phase submersible pump Havells starter that has been continuously giving me problems.  Their products command a premium in pricing and repairs are expensive.Seems to me Havells is losing it. They are cashing in on their brand name.  Remains to be seen how long it lasts.

Hi you get 70 to 75% % of taste and flavour like deep fry. But very easy to fry. It takes 6+6 minutes for chicken 10 leg pieces. Fish 10 mins, prawns 8 mins , remember coat light oil on the pieces and change the side while frying. Gives good fry.Very quick n easy ... we can‚Äôt put more 1/2 kg I guess. Because the bowl will accommodate that much. Little frying smell u get. But negligible compared to the work with deep oil fry.

I am in love with this product. Its amazing, i make fries, chicken, nuggets, cake. And i have been using this for two months now. Only thing dont fall in trap of Zero EMI option, they charge you, and you are left between calling bank and amazon. Better pay one time and pay less.

Pros: Good buildHigh wattage so quick cookingLess noiseNon stick coating is goodOilless cooking possibleAt 7000 INR a 4ltr air fryer from a good brand is a stealCons: Setting of time takes some timeWould be better if there were knobsThe separator felt flimsy

The product met and actually surpassed expectations. It makes ease of most tasks and its design is actually a little more cleaning friendly than the model I was using earlier which was more of a mesh making cleaning quite painful. Cooks well and most importantly quite fast as well.

It's a nice product in my home everybody in oil concious . This product is excellent . Now we enjoyed french fries , bharwa bhindi, baigan Mirch . For nonveg or veg everybody happy. It's easy to use even children can also cooked.
Am happy with the purchase...use it for all frying purposes...consumes less oil.Consumes electricity like all comparable productsWould have been happy it it had two levels...
